channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Oil ‘tourists’ pile into market amid biggest rally in two years
item.description: Volumes in the United States Oil Fund surged this week to the highest levels since Russia invaded Ukraine in 2022.

item.title: Why Cisco is looking at investing in hot AI startup CoreWeave
Oklahoma’s unusual requirements for school Bibles match Trump-endorsed version
item.description: Former Oklahoma Attorney General Drew Edmondson, a Democrat, said the bid “does not pass the smell test” and said a court could void it.

item.title: Cheap stocks to buy in the fourth quarter, according to HSBC

item.title: Ben Horowitz will donate to Harris campaign after Trump support
item.description: Horowitz emphasized the personal nature of the donation, saying he and his wife, Felicia, have known Harris for years and she has been “a great friend...

item.title: Solving America’s housing crisis means fixing the ‘ROI problem,’ says White House economist
item.description: “From the perspective of developers, building affordable housing just does not pencil out.”

item.title: Venture capitalist Ben Horowitz says he plans to donate to VP Kamala Harris' campaign
item.description: In an email to Andreessen-Horowitz employees, co-founder Ben Horowitz said he planned to donate to Kamala Harris' campaign for president.

item.title: Bets that oil will hit $100 a barrel surge on fears of wider Middle Eastern war

item.title: How China's stimulus could provide a boost to new CEOs at Nike and Starbucks down the line
item.description: The new executives are taking over companies that have significant sales exposure to China, but Wall Street is cautious about the impact of the stimul...

item.title: Wall Street resets rate-cut views with 'soft landing' in sight after jobs report
California vineyard owner says he was fined $120,000 for providing free housing to employee
item.description: The owner is suing Santa Clara County after officials fined him for allowing his longtime employee to live in an RV on his property for years.

item.title: Amazon bets on selling cashierless technology to retailers after pulling it from most U.S. stores

item.title: U.S. stocks end higher after strong jobs report as S&P 500 ekes out weekly gain
Kamala Harris buoyed by jobs report, inflation numbers as Election Day nears
